# alternateName

**Instance Property**

Provides a value that is displayed instead of the first and last name.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var alternateName: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The alternate name is only for display. It is not saved if this contact is added to the address book database.

## Displaying Person Properties

- **message**: Text displayed below [doc://com.apple.addressbookui/documentation/AddressBookUI/ABUnknownPersonViewController/alternateName].
- **displayedPerson**: Specifies a person record whose properties are displayed by the view controller.
